00627         glutReshapeFunc(reshape);
00628         glutMainLoop();
00629         return(0);
00630 }

00632 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00633 //  Initialize Settings
00634 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00635 void myinit()
00636 {
00637         // set background (sky colour)
00638         glClearColor(97.0/255.0, 140.0/255.0, 185.0/255.0, 1.0);
00639         
00640         // set perpsective
00641         gluLookAt(0.0, 1.75, 0.0, 
00642                       0.0, 1.75, -1,
00643                           0.0f,1.0f,0.0f);
00644         
00645         // settings for glut cylinders
00646         glu_cylinder = gluNewQuadric();
00647     gluQuadricTexture(glu_cylinder, GL_TRUE );
00648 
00649         // set the world co-ordinates (used to set quadrants for bounding boxes)
00650         cam.SetWorldCoordinates(36000.0, 43200.0);
00651         // turn collision detection on
00652         cam.SetCollisionDetectionOn(true);
00653         // set number of bounding boxes required
00654         cam.SetNoBoundingBoxes(27); //KM 16/9/2016 increased from 19
00655         // set starting position of user
00656         //cam.Position(32720.0, 9536.0, 4800.0, 180.0);
00657         cam.Position(35000.0, 12000, 26100, 90.0); //Temp starting position at top of stairs for easy access bug fixing
00658         
00659     
00660     
00661         CreatePlains(); 
00662         
00663 
00664         glLightfv(GL_LIGHT0, GL_AMBIENT, light_ambient);
00665         glLightfv(GL_LIGHT0, GL_DIFFUSE, light_diffuse);
00666         glLightfv(GL_LIGHT0, GL_SPECULAR, light_specular);
00667         glLightfv(GL_LIGHT0, GL_POSITION, light_position);
00668         glLightModelfv(GL_LIGHT_MODEL_AMBIENT, sun_colour);
00669 
00670         glEnable(GL_LIGHTING);
00671         glEnable(GL_LIGHT0);
00672 
00673         glEnable(GL_COLOR_MATERIAL);
00674         // creates bounding boxes and places in array
00675         CreateBoundingBoxes();
00676         // copies bounding boxes from array to linked lists (one fopr each quadrant)
00677         cam.InitiateBoundingBoxes();
00678         
00679         // load texture images and create display lists
00680         CreateTextureList();
00681         CreateTextures();
00682 
00683         //populate LeaderBoard
00684         uil.getLeaderBoard();
00685 }

00687 // MM update the camera collider
00688 void UpdateCamCollider()
00689 {
00690     float x, y, z; //MM - vars for x, y, z coords
00691     
00692     x =  cam.GetLR();
00693     y =  cam.GetUD();
00694     z = cam.GetFB();
00695     
00696     colDet.collisionInit_B(&Player, x, y, z, 10.0, 10.0,10.0); //MM - the size (10, 10) is a guess for size
00697     
00698 }

00906 
00907 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00908 void reshape(int w, int h)
00909 {
00910         width = w;
00911         height = h;
00912 
00913         //update ui objects
00914         uih.updateUIHIDMembers(w, h);
00915         uim.updateUIMenuMembers(w, h);
00916         uio.updateUIOptionsMembers(w, h);
00917         uil.updateUILeaderBoardMembers(w, h);
00918 
00919         // Prevent a divide by zero, when window is too short
00920         // (you cant make a window of zero width).
00921         if (h == 0) h = 1;
00922         ratio = 1.0f * w / h;
00923 
00924         // Reset the coordinate system before modifying
00925         glMatrixMode(GL_PROJECTION);
00926         glLoadIdentity();
00927         glViewport(0, 0, w, h);
00928         gluPerspective(45,ratio,1,250000);      
00929         glMatrixMode(GL_MODELVIEW);
00930 }

01213 
01214         case 'S':
01215         case 's':
01216                 cam.DirectionFB(-moveSpeed);
01217                 break;
01218

01220         case 'o':
01221                 PauseSpace();
01222                 break;
01223         }
01224 }

01276 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
01277 //  Mouse Buttons
01278 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
01279 void Mouse(int button, int state, int x, int y)
01280 {
01281         if (!uiMouseHandler(button, state, x, y, uih, uim, uio, uil) || gVar.DisplayExit) //filter for UI - KJM 18/10/2016 except for exit
01282         {
01283                 // exit tour if clicked on exit splash screen
01284                 if ((button == GLUT_LEFT_BUTTON) && (state == GLUT_DOWN))
01285                 {
01286                         if ((gVar.DisplayExit) && (x <= width / 2.0 + 256.0) && (x >= width / 2.0 - 256.0)
01287                                 && (y <= height / 2.0 + 256.0) && (y >= height / 2.0 - 256.0))
01288                         {
01289                                 DeleteImageFromMemory(image);
01290                                 uil.setLeaderBoard(); //write leaderboard to file to save for next time.
01291                                 exit(1);
01292                         }
01293                 }
01294         }
01295 }
01296 
01297 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
01298 //  Mouse Movements (NOT USED)
01299 //  Can be used to rotate around screen using mouse, but keyboard used instead
01300 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
01301 void mouseMove(int x, int y)
01302 {
01303                 if (x < 0)
01304                         cam.DirectionRotateLR(0);
01305                 else if (x > width)
01306                         cam.DirectionRotateLR(0);
01307                 else if (x > width/2.0)
01308                 {
01309                         cam.DirectionRotateLR(1);
01310                         Display();
01311                         glutWarpPointer(width/2.0,height/2.0);
01312                 }
01313                 else if (x < width/2.0)
01314                 {
01315                         cam.DirectionRotateLR(-1);
01316                         Display();
01317                         glutWarpPointer(width/2.0,height/2.0);
01318                 }
01319                 else
01320                         cam.DirectionRotateLR(0);
01321                 if (y < 0 || y > height)
01322                         cam.DirectionLookUD(0);
01323 
01324                 else if (y > height/2.0) {
01325                         cam.DirectionLookUD(-1);
01326                         Display();
01327                         glutWarpPointer(width/2.0,height/2.0);
01328                 }
01329                 else if (y < height/2.0) {
01330                         cam.DirectionLookUD(1);
01331                         Display();
01332                         glutWarpPointer(width/2.0,height/2.0);
01333                 }
01334                 else
01335                         cam.DirectionLookUD(0);
01336 }

01513 void CreatePlains()
01514 {       
01515         // grass slope
01516         cam.SetPlains (ZY_PLAIN, 4848.0 ,31568.0 ,9536.0, 10450.0 ,6200.0, 10000.0);

01522         cam.SetPlains (FLAT_PLAIN, 0.0, 36000.0 , 10450.0, 10450.0, 40000.0, 50000.0);
01523         */
01524         // top of lower hill

01526         cam.SetPlains (FLAT_PLAIN, 9000.0, 10000.0 , 10650.0, 10650.0, 28000.0, 33000.0);
01527         cam.SetPlains (FLAT_PLAIN, 9000.0, 22000.0 , 10650.0, 10650.0, 36000.0, 37000.0);

01530         cam.SetPlains (ZY_PLAIN, 6500.0, 27000.0 , 10650.0, 10450.0, 37000.0, 40000.0);

01533 
01534         // top of higher hill
01535         cam.SetPlains (FLAT_PLAIN, 14000.0, 18000.0 , 10875.0, 108075.0, 28000.0, 33000.0);
01536         // sides of higher hill
01537         cam.SetPlains(XY_PLAIN, 34260, 35700, 11875.0, 10450.0, 25500, 26000.0); // masedawg first step plain
01538 
01539         cam.SetPlains(XY_PLAIN, 34260, 35700, 11450.0, 12875.0, 26000, 26500.0); // 2nd step plain
01540 
01541         cam.SetPlains (ZY_PLAIN, 10000.0, 22000.0 , 10650.0, 10875.0, 23000.0, 28000.0);
01542         cam.SetPlains (ZY_PLAIN, 10000.0, 22000.0 , 10875.0, 10650.0, 33000.0, 36000.0);
01543         cam.SetPlains (XY_PLAIN, 10000.0, 14000.0 , 10650.0, 10875.0, 23000.0, 36000.0);
01544         cam.SetPlains (XY_PLAIN, 18000.0, 22000.0 , 10875.0, 10650.0, 23000.0, 36000.0);
01545 
01546         //for (int i = 0; i < 10; i++)
01547         //{

01549                 //cam.SetPlains(XY_PLAIN, 35700, 35700 - (10 * 95), 10000, 10000 + (10 * 75), 26400, 26000);
01550         //}
01551 
01552                 glBegin(GL_POLYGON);

01557                 glEnd();
01558

01560         step = 10450.0;

01562         for (int i = 0; i < 18 ; i ++)
01563         {
01564                 cam.SetPlains (FLAT_PLAIN, 31582.0, 33835, step, step, stepLength, stepLength + 42.0);          
01565                 step -= 48.0;
01566                 stepLength -= 142.0;
01567                 if ((i+3) % 5 == 0) 
01568                 {
01569                         stepLength -= 500.0;
01570                         step -= 48.0;
01571                 }
01572         }
01573         /*
01574         //first steps in physci corridor. KM 16/9/2016 
01575         step = 10000; // y, current height of step
01576         stepLength = 35700; //x, starts at, adjusted by depth of step
01577         for (int i = 0; i < 10; i++)
01578         {
01579                 cam.SetPlains(FLAT_PLAIN, stepLength, stepLength+95, step, step, 25960, 26360); //type, xs, xe, ys, ye, zs, ze
01580                 step += 75;
01581                 stepLength += 95;
01582         }
01583 
01584         //second steps in physci corridor. KM 16/9/2016 
01585         step = 10750; // y, current height of step
01586         stepLength = 35700-(9*95); //x, starts at, adjusted by depth of step
01587         for (int i = 0; i < 10; i++)
01588         {
01589                 cam.SetPlains(FLAT_PLAIN, stepLength, stepLength - 95, step, step, 26360, 26760); //type, xs, xe, ys, ye, zs, ze
01590                 step += 75;
01591                 stepLength -= 95;
01592         }
01593         */
01594         // temp plain to take down to ECL1
01595         cam.SetPlains (ZY_PLAIN, 3200.0, 4800.0 , 10450.0, 9370.0, 53400.0, 57900.0);
01596 }

01602 {

01604                 if (tempImage == NULL)

01606                 delete [] tempImage;
01607         }
01608 }

02435 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
02436 // Display the chancellery windoe and door posts
02437 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
02438 void DisplayChancPosts ()
02439 {
02440         // Windowposts Chanc (downstairs)
02441         step = 0.0;
02442         for (int i = 0; i < 14; i++)
02443         {
02444                 glPushMatrix();
02445                         glTranslatef(0.0, 0.0, step);
02446                         if ((i != 1) && (i != 2) && (i != 10) && (i != 11))
02447                         {                       
02448                                 glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, tp.GetTexture(WINDOWPOST_CHANC_FRONT));
02449                                 glCallList(11);
02450                         }
02451                         if ((i != 1) && (i != 10))
02452                         {                       
02453                                 glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, tp.GetTexture(WINDOWPOST_CHANC_RIGHT));
02454                                 glCallList(12);
02455                         }
02456                         if ((i != 2) && (i != 11))
02457                         {
02458                                 glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, tp.GetTexture(WINDOWPOST_CHANC_LEFT));
02459                                 glCallList(13);
02460                         }
02461                                 
02462                 glPopMatrix();          
02463                 step += 960.0;
02464         }
02465 
02466         //  Windowledges Chanc (downstairs)
02467         step = 0.0;
02468         for (int i = 0; i < 11; i++)
02469         {
02470                 glPushMatrix();
02471                         glTranslatef(0.0, 0.0, step);
02472                         glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, tp.GetTexture(WINDOWLEDGE_CHANC_FRONT));
02473                         glCallList(14);
02474                 
02475                         glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, tp.GetTexture(WINDOWLEDGE_CHANC_TOP));
02476                         glCallList(15);         
02477                 glPopMatrix();
02478                 if ((i == 0) || (i == 8)) step += 960.0;
02479                 step += 960.0;
02480         }
02481 
02482         // Windowposts & Ledges Chanc (upstairs)
02483         glPushMatrix();
02484         step = 0.0;
02485         glTranslatef(0.0, 1023.0, 0.0);
02486         for (int i = 0; i < 14; i++)
02487         {
02488                 glTranslatef(0.0, 0.0, step);
02489                 glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, tp.GetTexture(WINDOWPOST_CHANC_FRONT));
02490                 glCallList(11);
02491                         
02492                 glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, tp.GetTexture(WINDOWPOST_CHANC_RIGHT));
02493                 glCallList(12);
02494         
02495                 glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, tp.GetTexture(WINDOWPOST_CHANC_LEFT));
02496                 glCallList(13);
02497                 if (i != 13)
02498                 {
02499                         glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, tp.GetTexture(WINDOWLEDGE_CHANC_FRONT));
02500                         glCallList(14);
02501                 
02502                         glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, tp.GetTexture(WINDOWLEDGE_CHANC_TOP));
02503                         glCallList(15);
02504                 }
02505                 step =+ 960.0;
02506         }
02507         glPopMatrix();
02508 
02509         glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, tp.GetTexture(WINDOW_LEDGE_END_1));
02510         glCallList(235);
02511         glPushMatrix();
02512                 glTranslatef(0.0, 320.0, 7447.0);
02513                 glCallList(235);
02514         glPopMatrix();
02515         glPushMatrix();
02516                 glTranslatef(0.0, 1024.0, 0.0);
02517                 glCallList(235);
02518         glPopMatrix();
02519         glPushMatrix();
02520                 glTranslatef(0.0, 320.0, 5527);
02521                 glCallList(235);
02522         glPopMatrix();
02523         glPushMatrix();
02524                 glTranslatef(0.0, 320.0, 6551);
02525                 glCallList(235);
02526         glPopMatrix();
02527         glPushMatrix();
02528                 glTranslatef(0.0, 320.0, 8471);
02529                 glCallList(235);
02530         glPopMatrix();
02531         glPushMatrix();
02532                 glTranslatef(0.0, 1152.0, 19031.0);
02533                 glCallList(235);
02534         glPopMatrix();
02535 
02536         glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, tp.GetTexture(WINDOW_LEDGE_END_2));
02537         glCallList(236);
02538         glCallList(237);
02539         glPushMatrix();
02540                 glTranslatef(0.0, 0.0, -960.0);
02541                 glCallList(237);
02542         glPopMatrix();
02543         glPushMatrix();
02544                 glTranslatef(0.0, 0.0, -8640.0);
02545                 glCallList(237);
02546         glPopMatrix();
02547         glPushMatrix();
02548                 glTranslatef(0.0, 0.0, -9600.0);
02549                 glCallList(237);
02550         glPopMatrix();
02551 
02552         //glPushMatrix();
02553                 //glTranslatef(0.0, 320.0, -9600.0);
02554                 //glCallList(237);
02555 //      glPopMatrix();
02556

02558         glPushMatrix();
02559                 glTranslatef(0.0, 1024.0, 0.0);
02560                 glCallList(236);
02561         glPopMatrix();
02562         glPushMatrix();
02563                 glTranslatef(0.0, 320.0, 7383.0);

02599                         glTexCoord2f(0.0, 0.9375);
02600                         glVertex3f(33808.0, 10224.0, 9552.0 + (1024.0 * 0.9375));
02601                         glTexCoord2f(1.0, 0.9375);
02602                         glVertex3f(33928.0, 10268.0, 9552.0 + (1024.0 * 0.9375));
02603                         glTexCoord2f(1.0, 0.0);
02604                         glVertex3f(33928.0, 10268.0, 9552.0);
02605                 glEnd();
02606         glEndList();
02607         tp.CreateDisplayList (YZ, 235, 32.0, 64.0, 33808.0, 10192.0, 22032.0, 1.0, 1.0); // front ledge
02608         tp.CreateDisplayList (XY, 236, 64.0, 64.0, 33808.0, 10192.0, 22096.0, 1.35, 0.5); // front ledge
02609 
02610         // Window Edges
02611         glNewList(237, GL_COMPILE); 
02612                 glBegin(GL_QUADS);
02613                         glTexCoord2f(0.0, 0.0);
02614                         glVertex3f(33808.0, 10225.0, 20112.0);
02615                         glTexCoord2f(0.0, 0.5);
02616                         glVertex3f(33808.0, 10192.0, 20112.0);
02617                         glTexCoord2f(0.5, 0.5);
02618                         glVertex3f(33872.0, 10192.0, 20112.0);
02619                         glTexCoord2f(0.5, 0.0);
02620                         glVertex3f(33872.0, 10247.0, 20112.0);
02621                 glEnd();
02622         glEndList();
02623 
02624

02970 void DisplayPurplePosts ()
02971 {
02972         glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, tp.GetTexture(PURPLE_POST));
02973         glCallList(29);

02975                 glTranslatef(0.0, 0.0, 4800.0);
02976                 glCallList(29);
02977         glPopMatrix();
02978         glCallList(30);
02979         glPushMatrix();
02980                 glTranslatef(0.0, 0.0, 960.0);
02981                 glCallList(30);
02982         glPopMatrix();
02983         glPushMatrix();
02984                 glTranslatef(0.0, 0.0, 2880.0);
02985                 glCallList(30);
02986         glPopMatrix();
02987 
02988         glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, tp.GetTexture(PURPLE_POSTSIDE));
02989         glCallList(31);
02990                 glPushMatrix();
02991                         glTranslatef(0.0, 0.0, -112.0);
02992                         glCallList(31);
02993                 glPopMatrix();
02994 
02995         step = 865.0;
02996         for (int i = 0; i < 3; i++)
02997         {
02998                 glPushMatrix();
02999                         glTranslatef(0.0, 0.0, step);
03000                         glCallList(31);
03001                 glPopMatrix();
03002                 glPushMatrix();
03003                         glTranslatef(0.0, 0.0, step + 78.0);
03004                         glCallList(31);
03005                 glPopMatrix();
03006                 step += 960.0;
03007                 if (i == 1) step += 960.0;
03008         }
03009         glPushMatrix();
03010                 glTranslatef(0.0, 0.0, 4688.0);
03011                 glCallList(31);
03012         glPopMatrix();
03013                 glCallList(32);
03014 }

03072 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
03073 // Display Main Posts
03074 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
03075 void DisplayMainPosts ()
03076 {
03077         step = 0.0;
03078         stepLength = 0.0;
03079         step2 = 0.0;
03080         for (int j = 0; j < 2; j++)
03081         {
03082                 glPushMatrix(); 
03083                         glTranslatef(stepLength, 0.0, step2);
03084                         for (int i = 0; i < 17; i++)
03085                         {               
03086                                 glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, tp.GetTexture(MAIN_POST));
03087                                 glPushMatrix(); 
03088                                         glTranslatef(0.0, 0.0, step);
03089                                         glCallList(18);
03090                                 glPopMatrix();
03091                                 glPushMatrix();
03092                                         glTranslatef(0.0, 0.0, step + 128.0);
03093                                         glCallList(18);
03094                                 glPopMatrix();
03095                                 if ((i == 7) && (j ==0))        // between chanc and phys sci
03096                                 {
03097                                         glPushMatrix(); 
03098                                                 glTranslatef(4008.0, 0.0, step);
03099                                                 glCallList(18);
03100                                         glPopMatrix();
03101                                         glPushMatrix();
03102                                                 glTranslatef(4008.0, 0.0, step + 128.0);
03103                                                 glCallList(18);
03104                                         glPopMatrix();
03105                                 }
03106                 
03107                                 glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, tp.GetTexture(MAIN_POST_2));
03108                                 glPushMatrix(); 
03109                                         glTranslatef(0.0, 0.0, step);
03110                                         glCallList(19);
03111                                 glPopMatrix();
03112                                 glPushMatrix();
03113                                         glTranslatef(128.0, 0.0, step);
03114                                         glCallList(19);
03115                                 glPopMatrix();
03116                                 if ((i == 7) && (j ==0))        // between chanc and phys sci
03117                                 {
03118                                         glPushMatrix(); 
03119                                                 glTranslatef(4008.0, 0.0, step);
03120                                                 glCallList(19);
03121                                         glPopMatrix();
03122                                 }
03123                                 step += 1930.0;
03124                         }
03125                         stepLength -= 27192.0;
03126                         step2 -= 32810.0;
03127                 glPopMatrix();
03128         }
03129 
03130         // library front
03131         step = -1940.0;
03132         for (int i = 0; i < 13; i++)
03133         {               
03134                 glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, tp.GetTexture(MAIN_POST));
03135                 glPushMatrix(); 
03136                         glTranslatef(step, 0.0, 30880.0);
03137                         glCallList(18);
03138                 glPopMatrix();
03139                 glPushMatrix();
03140                         glTranslatef(step, 0.0, 31008.0);
03141                         glCallList(18);
03142                 glPopMatrix();
03143                 
03144                 glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, tp.GetTexture(MAIN_POST_2));
03145                 glPushMatrix();
03146                         glTranslatef(step, 0.0, 30880.0);
03147                         glCallList(19);
03148                 glPopMatrix();
03149                 glPushMatrix();
03150                         glTranslatef(step + 128.0, 0.0, 30880.0);
03151                         glCallList(19);
03152                 glPopMatrix();
03153                 step -= 1940.0;
03154         }
03155 
03156         // first on chanc steps
03157         glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, tp.GetTexture(MAIN_POST));
03158         glCallList(51);
03159         glPushMatrix();
03160                 glTranslatef(0.0, 0.0, 128.0);
03161                 glCallList(51);
03162         glPopMatrix();
03163         glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, tp.GetTexture(MAIN_POST_2));
03164         glCallList(52);
03165         glPushMatrix();
03166                 glTranslatef(128.0, 0.0, 0.0);
03167                 glCallList(52);
03168         glPopMatrix();

04400 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
04401 //  Creates Angled Roof Beams
04402 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
04403 void DrawAngledRoofBeam (int listNo, GLdouble x, GLdouble y, GLdouble z, GLdouble beamSize)
04404 {
04405         glNewList(listNo, GL_COMPILE);
04406                 glBegin(GL_QUADS);
04407                         glTexCoord2f(0.0, 0.0);
04408                         glVertex3f(x, y, z + 32.0);
04409                         glTexCoord2f(0.0, 1.0);
04410                         glVertex3f(x, y, z);
04411                         glTexCoord2f(beamSize, 1.0);
04412                         glVertex3f(33848.0, 12012.72, z);
04413                         glTexCoord2f(beamSize, 0.0);
04414                         glVertex3f(33848.0, 12012.72, z + 32.0);
04415                 glEnd();
04416         glEndList();
04417         glNewList(listNo + 5, GL_COMPILE);
04418                 glBegin(GL_QUADS);
04419                         glTexCoord2f(0.0, 0.0);
04420                         glVertex3f(x, y, z);
04421                         glTexCoord2f(0.0, 1.0);
04422                         glVertex3f(x, y + 82.0, z);
04423                         glTexCoord2f(beamSize, 1.0);
04424                         glVertex3f(33848.0, 12012.72 + 82.0, z);

05601 void DisplayPlanets()
05602 {
05603         if (LevelNum > 0)
05604         {
05605 
05606                 //SUN
05607                 glPushMatrix();
05608                 //glColor3f(1, 1, 0);
05609 
05610                 glTranslatef(allPlanets[0][0], allPlanets[0][1] * SizeMult, allPlanets[0][2] * SizeMult);
05611                 glColorMaterial(GL_FRONT_AND_BACK, GL_AMBIENT_AND_DIFFUSE);
05612                 glMaterialfv(GL_FRONT_AND_BACK, GL_EMISSION, sun_colour);
05613 
05614                 glRotatef(rotAmt[0], 0, 1, 0);
05615                 glRotatef(90, 1, 0, 0);
05616                 //glScalef(5,5,5);
05617                 //    glColor3f(1,1,0);
05618 
05619                 glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, tp.GetTexture(PLANETS_SUN)); // MM - temp texture
05620                 gluSphere(quad, allPlanets[0][3] * SizeMult, 20, 20); // MM - changed to glusphere for texturing
05621 
05622                                                                                                                           //glutSolidSphere(allPlanets[0][3] * SizeMult, 20, 20);
05623                                                                                                                           //    glMaterialfv( GL_FRONT, GL_EMISSION, planet_emission );
05624         
05625                 colDet.collisionInit_S(&Collider_Sun, allPlanets[0][0], allPlanets[0][1] * SizeMult, allPlanets[0][2] * SizeMult, allPlanets[0][3] * SizeMult); // MM - Position setup for collider sphere
05626 
05627                 glPopMatrix();
05628 
05629                 //Mercury
05630                 glPushMatrix();
05631                 //glColor3f(1, .5, 0);

05754                 colDet.collisionInit_S(&Collider_Uranus, allPlanets[7][0] * SizeMult + SunX, allPlanets[7][1] * SizeMult, allPlanets[7][2] * SizeMult, SunSize*DistMult*allPlanets[7][3] * SizeMult); // MM - Position setup for collider sphere
05755 
05756                 glPopMatrix();
05757 
05758                 //Neptune
05759                 glPushMatrix();
05760                 //glColor3f(0, 0, 1);
05761                 //glRotatef(orbAmt[7],0,1,0);
05762                 glTranslatef(allPlanets[8][0] * SizeMult + SunX, allPlanets[8][1] * SizeMult, allPlanets[8][2] * SizeMult);
05763                 //glutSolidSphere(SunSize*DistMult*allPlanets[8][3] * SizeMult, 20, 20);
05764 
05765                 glRotatef(rotAmt[8], 0, 1, 0);
05766                 glRotatef(90, 1, 0, 0);
05767                 glMaterialfv(GL_FRONT, GL_EMISSION, planet_emission);
05768                 glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, tp.GetTexture(PLANETS_NEPTUNE)); //MM - temp texture
05769                 gluSphere(quad, SunSize*DistMult*allPlanets[8][3] * SizeMult, 20, 20);
05770 
05771                 colDet.collisionInit_S(&Collider_Neptune, allPlanets[8][0] * SizeMult + SunX, allPlanets[8][1] * SizeMult, allPlanets[8][2] * SizeMult, SunSize*DistMult*allPlanets[8][3] * SizeMult); // MM - Position setup for collider sphere
05772 
05773                 glPopMatrix();
05774 
05775                 //Pluto
05776                 glPushMatrix();
05777                 //glColor3f(1, .7, 0);
05778                 //glRotatef(orbAmt[8],0,1,0);
05779                 glTranslatef(allPlanets[9][0] * SizeMult + SunX, allPlanets[9][1] * SizeMult, allPlanets[9][2] * SizeMult);
05780                 //glutSolidSphere(SunSize*DistMult*allPlanets[9][3] * SizeMult, 20, 20);
05781 
05782                 glRotatef(rotAmt[9], 0, 1, 0);
05783                 glRotatef(90, 1, 0, 0);
05784                 glMaterialfv(GL_FRONT, GL_EMISSION, planet_emission);
05785                 glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, tp.GetTexture(PLANETS_PLUTO)); //MM - temp texture
05786                 gluSphere(quad, SunSize*DistMult*allPlanets[9][3] * SizeMult, 20, 20);
05787 
05788                 colDet.collisionInit_S(&Collider_Pluto, allPlanets[9][0] * SizeMult + SunX, allPlanets[9][1] * SizeMult, allPlanets[9][2] * SizeMult, SunSize*DistMult*allPlanets[9][3] * SizeMult); // MM - Position setup for collider sphere
05789 
05790                 glPopMatrix();
05791         }
05792 
05793 }
05794 
05795 //Calculate new position each planet will be moved to 
05796 void OrbitPlanets()
05797 {
05798         GLdouble x, z;
05799 
05800         //rotAmt[0] += RotationSpeed[0] * 0.01;
05801         rotAmt[0] += RotationSpeed[0] * RotSpeed;
05802         //Planets orbiting sun
05803         for (int i = 0; i < 9; i++)
05804         {
05805                 x = (allPlanets[i + 1][2] * sin(OrbitSpeed[i] * RotSpeed)) + (allPlanets[i + 1][0] * cos(OrbitSpeed[i] * RotSpeed));
05806                 z = (allPlanets[i + 1][2] * cos(OrbitSpeed[i] * RotSpeed)) - (allPlanets[i + 1][0] * sin(OrbitSpeed[i] * RotSpeed));
05807 
05808                 allPlanets[i + 1][0] = x;
05809                 allPlanets[i + 1][2] = z;
05810 
05811                 //rotAmt[i+1] += RotationSpeed[i+1] * 0.01; 
05812                 rotAmt[i + 1] += RotationSpeed[i + 1] * RotSpeed;
05813         }
05814 }
05815 
05816 void CheckLocationForTeleport()
05817 {
05818         //x:33467
05819         //y : 10450
05820         //z : 39508
05821         if (cam.GetLR() > TeleportToX - 1000 && cam.GetLR() < TeleportToX + 1000 && cam.GetUD() > TeleportToY - 1000 && cam.GetUD() < TeleportToY + 1000 && cam.GetFB() > TeleportToZ - 1000 && cam.GetFB() < TeleportToZ + 1000)
05822         {
05823                 TeleportToPlanets();
05824         }
05825 
05826         if (cam.GetLR() > TeleportFromX - 1000 && cam.GetLR() < TeleportFromX + 1000 && cam.GetUD() > TeleportFromY - 1000 && cam.GetUD() < TeleportFromY + 1000 && cam.GetFB() > TeleportFromZ - 1000 && cam.GetFB() < TeleportFromZ + 1000)
05827         {
05828                 TeleportToBushCourt();
05829         }
05830 }
05831 
05832 void TeleportToPlanets()
05833 {
05834         moveSpeed = 8;
05835         gVar.uiHUD = InSpace = true;
05836         glClearColor(0, 0, 0, 1.0);
05837         cam.Position(SunX, allPlanets[0][1], cam.GetFB(), 0);
05838 
05839         //KM 13/9/2016 Sound bite 
05840         //CEasySound *es;
05841         //CSound* firstSound;
05842         es = CEasySound::Instance();
05843         firstSound = es->GetSound(es->Load("sounds/greeting.wav"));
05844         firstSound->Play();
05845     
05846         colDet.collisionOffset_B(&Player, (float)SunX, (float)allPlanets[0][1], cam.GetFB()); // MM - moves collider box
05847 }
05848 void TeleportToBushCourt()
05849 {
05850         gVar.uiHUD = InSpace = false;
05851         moveSpeed = 3;
05852         glClearColor(97.0 / 255.0, 140.0 / 255.0, 185.0 / 255.0, 1.0);
05853         cam.Position(32720.0, 9536.0, 4800.0, 180.0);
05854 }

05856 //-------------Ball Functions-------------
05857 void addParticle(float m, float r, float vx, float vy, float vz)
05858 {
05859         struct Ball p;
05860         r = r * 3;
05861         p.x = cam.GetLR();
05862         p.y = cam.GetUD() - r;
05863         p.z = cam.GetFB();
05864 
05865         p.vx = vx / 30; // /30 in case it is a speed particle,
05866         p.vy = vy / 30; // slow down the speed a little
05867         p.vz = vz / 30;
05868 
05869         p.m = m;
05870         p.r = r;
05871         p.speed = 50000000;
05872 
05873         p.color[0] = 1;
05874         p.color[1] = 0;
05875         p.color[2] = 0;
05876 
05877         p.visible = true;
05878 
05879         Balls[current_balls] = p;
05880         current_balls++;
05881 
05882         //es = CEasySound::Instance();
05883         //firstSound = es->GetSound(es->Load("sounds/greeting.wav"));
05884         //firstSound->Play();
05885 }
05886 
05887 void DrawBalls()
05888 {
05889         for (int i = 0; i < current_balls; i++)
05890         {
05891                 struct Ball *p = &Balls[i];
05892                 if (p->visible)
05893                 {
05894                         glPushMatrix();
05895 
05896                         glTranslatef(p->x, p->y, p->z);
05897                         //glMaterialfv(GL_FRONT, GL_EMISSION, planet_emission);
05898                         glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, tp.GetTexture(ASTEROID));
05899                         gluSphere(quad, p->r, 20, 20);
05900 
05901                         colDet.collisionInit_S(&Collider_Balls[i], p->x, p->y, p->z,p->r); // MM - Position setup for collider sphere
05902 
05903                         glPopMatrix();
05904                 }
05905         }
05906 }
05907 
05908 void UpdateBalls()
05909 {
05910         if (!(Paused))
05911         {
05912                 for (int i = 0; i < current_balls; i++)
05913                 {
05914                         struct Ball *p;
05915                         p = &Balls[i];
05916 
05917                         for (int j = 0; j < LevelNum * 3 + 1; j++)
05918                         {
05919                                 float d;
05920                                 if (j == 0) 
05921                                 {
05922                                         d = sqrt(((allPlanets[j][0]) - p->x)*((allPlanets[j][0]) - p->x) + (allPlanets[j][1] * SizeMult - p->y)*(allPlanets[j][1] * SizeMult - p->y) + (allPlanets[j][2] * SizeMult - p->z)*(allPlanets[j][2] * SizeMult - p->z));
05923                                 }
05924                                 else
05925                                 {
05926                                         d = sqrt(((allPlanets[j][0] * SizeMult + SunX) - p->x)*((allPlanets[j][0] * SizeMult + SunX) - p->x) + (allPlanets[j][1] * SizeMult - p->y)*(allPlanets[j][1] * SizeMult - p->y) + (allPlanets[j][2] * SizeMult - p->z)*(allPlanets[j][2] * SizeMult - p->z));
05927                                 }
05928 
05929                                 float ds = (SunSize*DistMult*allPlanets[j][3] * SizeMult) + p->r;
05930                                 //cout << j << "\nd: " << d << "\nds: " << ds << "\n" << endl;
05931 
05932                                 if (d > (allPlanets[j][3] * SizeMult) + p->r)
05933                                 {
05934                                         if (j == 0)
05935                                                 p->vx += p->speed * allPlanets[j][4] / (d*d) * ((allPlanets[j][0]) - p->x) / d; //f = ma => a = f/m
05936                                         else
05937                                                 p->vx += p->speed * allPlanets[j][4] / (d*d) * ((allPlanets[j][0] * SizeMult + SunX) - p->x) / d; //f = ma => a = f/m
05938 
05939                                         p->vy += p->speed * allPlanets[j][4] / (d*d) * (allPlanets[j][1] * SizeMult - p->y) / d;
05940                                         p->vz += p->speed * allPlanets[j][4] / (d*d) * (allPlanets[j][2] * SizeMult - p->z) / d;
05941 
05942                                         p->x += p->vx;
05943                                         p->y += p->vy;
05944                                         p->z += p->vz;
05945                                 }
05946                                 else
05947                                 {
05948                                         p->visible = false;
05949                                         cout << "coloide" << endl;
05950                                         /*p->vx -= p->speed * allPlanets[j][4] / (d*d) * ((allPlanets[j][0] * SizeMult + SunX) - p->x) / d; //f = ma => a = f/m
05951                                         p->vy -= p->speed * allPlanets[j][4] / (d*d) * (allPlanets[j][1] * SizeMult - p->y) / d;
05952                                         p->vz -= p->speed * allPlanets[j][4] / (d*d) * (allPlanets[j][2] * SizeMult - p->z) / d;*/
05953                                 }               
05954 
05955                                 
05956                         }
05957                 }
05958         }
05959         //glutPostRedisplay();
05960 }

06218 
06219 void DrawCorridorSteps(int stepH, int stepD, int stepW, int stepStartX, int stepStartY, int stepStartZ, int count)
06220 {
06221         // our steps
06222         for (int i = 0; i < count; i++)
06223         {
06224                 //top of steps
06225                 glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, tp.GetTexture(PS_STEP_FRONT)); 
06226                 glBegin(GL_POLYGON);
06227                         glColor3f(0, 1, 0);
06228                         glTexCoord2f(1.0, 1.0);
06229                         glVertex3f(stepStartX - (i * stepD), stepStartY + (i * stepH), stepStartZ);
06230                         glTexCoord2f(0.0, 1.0);
06231                         glVertex3f(stepStartX - (i * stepD), stepStartY + (i * stepH), stepStartZ-stepW);
06232                         glTexCoord2f(0.0, 0.0);
06233                         glVertex3f(stepStartX - (i * stepD), stepStartY + stepH + (i * stepH), stepStartZ-stepW);
06234                         glTexCoord2f(1.0, 0.0);
06235                         glVertex3f(stepStartX - (i * stepD), stepStartY + stepH + (i * stepH), stepStartZ);
06236                 glEnd();
06237                 
06238                 // front of steps
06239                 glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, tp.GetTexture(PS_STEP_TOP));
06240                 glBegin(GL_POLYGON);
06241                         glColor3f(1, 0, 1);
06242                         glTexCoord2f(1.0, 0.0);
06243                         glVertex3f(stepStartX - (i * stepD), stepStartY + stepH + (i * stepH), stepStartZ);
06244                         glTexCoord2f(0.0, 0.0);
06245                         glVertex3f(stepStartX - (i * stepD), stepStartY + stepH + (i * stepH), stepStartZ - stepW);
06246                         glTexCoord2f(0.0, 1.0);
06247                         glVertex3f(stepStartX - stepD - (i * stepD), stepStartY + stepH + (i * stepH), stepStartZ - stepW);
06248                         glTexCoord2f(1.0, 1.0);
06249                         glVertex3f(stepStartX - stepD - (i * stepD), stepStartY + stepH + (i * stepH), stepStartZ);
06250                 glEnd();
06251                 
06252         }
06253 }
06254 //***********************END CORRIDOR FUNCTIONS***********************
06255 //*********************PAUSE FUCNTION*********************
06256 void PauseSpace()
06257 {
06258         if (Paused)
06259         {
06260                 RotSpeed = tempSpeed;
06261                 Paused = false;
06262         }
06263         else
06264         {
06265                 tempSpeed = RotSpeed;
06266                 RotSpeed = 0;
06267                 Paused = true;
06268         }
06269         
06270 }
06271 //**********************END PAUSE*************************

06273 // Display Light Fittings
06274 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
06275 void DisplayLights ()
06276 {
06277         // Light Fitting
06278         glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, tp.GetTexture(LIGHT));
06279         GLdouble beamstep = 0.0;
06280         for (int i = 0; i < 4; i++)
06281         {
06282                 glPushMatrix();
06283                         glTranslatef(32905.0, 11200.0, 11134.0 + beamstep);
06284                         glRotatef( 90.0, 1.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f );
06285                         glRotatef( -90.0, 0.0f, 0.0f, 1.0f );
06286                         glCallList(376);
06287                 glPopMatrix();
06288 
06289                 glPushMatrix();
06290                         glTranslatef(32905.0, 11265.0, 11134.0 + beamstep);
06291                         glRotatef( 90.0, 1.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f );
06292                         glRotatef( -90.0, 0.0f, 0.0f, 1.0f );
06293                         glCallList(376);
06294                 glPopMatrix();
06295 
06296                 glPushMatrix();
06297                         glTranslatef(32905.0, 11330.0, 11134.0 + beamstep);
06298                          glRotatef( 90.0, 1.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f );
06299                          glRotatef( -90.0, 0.0f, 0.0f, 1.0f );
06300                         glCallList(376);
06301                 glPopMatrix();
06302                 beamstep += 8492.0;
06303         }
06304         
06305         // Light Supports
06306         beamstep = 0.0;
06307         for (int i = 0; i < 4; i++)
06308         {
06309                 glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, tp.GetTexture(LIGHT_SUPPORT_2));
06310                 step = -40.0;
06311                 for (int k = 0; k < 2; k++)
06312                 {
06313                         for (int j = 0; j < 2; j++)
06314                         {
06315                                 glPushMatrix();
06316                                         glTranslatef(step, 0.0, 0.0 + beamstep);
06317                                         glCallList(377);
06318                                 glPopMatrix();
06319                                 glPushMatrix();
06320                                         glTranslatef(step, 0.0, -40.0 + beamstep);
06321                                         glCallList(377);
06322                                 glPopMatrix();
06323                                 step += 8.0;
06324                         }
06325                         step += 64.0;
06326                 }
06327 
06328                 glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, tp.GetTexture(LIGHT_SUPPORT));
06329                 step = -40.0;
06330                 for (int k = 0; k < 2; k++)
06331                 {
06332                         step2 = 0.0;
06333                         for (int j = 0; j < 2; j++)
06334                         {
06335                                 glPushMatrix();
06336                                         glTranslatef(step, 0.0, 0.0 + step2 + beamstep);
06337                                         glCallList(378);
06338                                 glPopMatrix();
06339                                 glPushMatrix();
06340                                         glTranslatef(step, 0.0, -40.0 + step2 + beamstep);
06341                                         glCallList(378);
06342                                 glPopMatrix();
06343                                 step2 += 8.0;
06344                         }
06345                         step += 80.0;
06346                 }
06347                 beamstep += 8492.0;
06348         }       
06349

06615 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
06616 //  Increments frame count used for setting movement speed
06617 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
06618 void IncrementFrameCount()
06619 {
06620         double t = ((GLdouble)(clock()-lastClock))/(GLdouble)CLOCKS_PER_SEC;  
06621         frameCount ++;
06622 
06623         // reset after t
06624         if (t > 0.1)
06625         {
06626                 stepIncrement = t/frameCount * 1400;
06627                 angleIncrement = t/frameCount;
06628                 frameCount = 0;
06629                 lastClock = clock();
06630         }
06631 }
